bibl.title: The 1991 Excavations at Ismant el-Kharab in the Dakhleh Oasis.
bibl.note: Investigation of the residential quarter, termed Area A (papyrus' finds, inscribed boards) and excavation of the Main Temple dedicated to Tutu, in use during the second century A.D.
bibl.seg: HOPE Colin A., The 1991 Excavations at Ismant el-Kharab in the Dakhleh Oasis.
Investigation of the residential quarter, termed Area A (papyrus' finds, inscribed boards) and excavation of the Main Temple dedicated to Tutu, in use during the second century A.D.
